titles.title: Let Us Break Bread Together (setting sun)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Let us break bread together on our knees
Let us break bread together on our knees
When I fall on my knees
With my face to the setting sun
O Lord have mercy on me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let us praise God together on our knees
Let us praise God together on our knees
When I fall on my knees
With my face to the setting sun
O Lord have mercy on me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us serve God together on our knees
Let us serve God together on our knees
When I fall on my knees
With my face to the setting sun
O Lord have mercy on me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
(optional)
O Lord have mercy
Lord have mercy have mercy
